num_prespawn_kit.desc: Number of child processes to keep started in advance and waiting for new clients.

sys_template_path.desc: Path to a template tree with shared libraries etc to be used as source for chroot jails for child processes.

lo_template_path.desc: Path to a LibreOffice installation tree to be copied (linked) into the jails for child processes. Should be on the same file system as systemplate.

child_root_path.desc: Path to the directory under which the chroot jails for the child processes will be created. Should be on the same file system as systemplate and lotemplate.

lo_jail_subpath.desc: Relative path where the LibreOffice installation will be copied inside a jail.

file_server_root_path.desc: Path to the directory that should be considered root for the file server.

wopi.desc: Allow/deny wopi storage. Mutually exclusive with webdav.

max_file_size.desc: Maximum document size in bytes to load. 0 for unlimited.

webdav.desc: Allow/deny webdav storage. Mutually exclusive with wopi.
